name: MPSB(early alpha)
description:
CONTROLS:

A / D: move left / right

Mouse left click: throw BOMB*

*You launch 2 types of bomb, alternately:

PINK bomb: being close to the explosion springs you in the direction of the explosion (eg: hitting the floor springs you up, hiting a wall to your left springs you to the right)

BLACK bomb: destroys fragile walls,  but being close to the explosion blows you up!
